name: Ferret Frenzy
description:
This game centers around a Ferret that wants to ruin the morning for his very
occupied owner, Gerald. The player's goal is to find your owner’s morning routine items and completely mess up his day so he can't get to work on time. These items being his Cell Phone, Wallet, and Keys. The player will be given a chance to locate and take one asset at a time to any spot within the room accessible to the character. This is important because the player’s goal is to make the NPC ultimately fail at finding his
keys.

The owners job will be to thwart the player’s actions through three separate actions. The first being determined by the visibility of the item and distance hidden from the NPC. The second being the NPC takes said objects and places them in key areas harder for the player to traverse. The third being that the owner will periodically pick up the ferret and place them in a cage. Through these actions, maybe, just maybe. The owner will make it on time for work for once.
